attributes.additional_details:
Forty years ago there was a horrific genocide in Cambodia that lead to the killing of over 2 million innocent people. The Khmer Rouge gathered the vast majority of the educated people in Cambodia and murdered them. Today, Cambodia is lacking in a real educational system and families who are stricken by poverty (90% of the population) are forced to work hard in bad circumstances rather than to attend school.

This petition is aimed at our government donating a school in every province in Cambodia. Our government will build a school, furnish it, set a school curriculum, train the teachers and the school will be free to all Khmer nationals. The government will also set up a volunteer programme for English nationals from various trades to travel to Cambodia and help with the process such as; building, teaching, painting etc.

This is a chance for our country to do something selfless and giving, and for our country to take part in something that no country has ever done before.
